keywords: ['traditional south asian music', 'eastern music', 'sitar', 'tranquil', 'relaxing', 'peaceful', 'medtiation music', 'sustained buzzing sound', 'acoustic guitar arpeggio']
caption: The clip is of traditional eastern sounds that would be found in India. We hear notes being played on a sitar, as well as an acoustic guitar. There's also a sustained buzzing instrument in the background which creates a relaxed atmosphere.
